accountPage.advisory1: Onboard expenses include things like drinks, casino, and spa treatments, similar to incidental charges at a hotel.
accountPage.advisory2: We don't use cash or credit cards on board. Instead, set up an Onboard Expense Account and simply use your room key card which is linked to this account.
accountPage.advisory3: On the day of departure, we will put a hold on your credit card in the amount of ${{ perDiemCost }} per day (${{ totalCost }} total per person). Or, if you prefer, you may bring cash in this amount and pay at the front desk within 24 hours of boarding.
accountPage.advisory4: At the end of the cruise you will only be charged for the actual amount spent.
accountPage.cashAdvisory: Bring ${{ totalCost }} to the front desk within 24 hours of boarding
accountPage.ccAdvisory: Save time at boarding. Your card will not be charged until the day of departure.
accountPage.acceptTerms: I agree to the Onboard Expenses Terms and Conditions
accountPage.onboardExpenseTandC: If you do not want to use a credit or debit card, the ship will collect a cash deposit from you at time of boarding in the same amount as credit card payers (USD ${{ perDiemCost }}/person/day multiplied by the number of days of the cruise). ***Note - With the cash option, you MUST bring enough cash to cover the ${{ perDiemCost }}/person/day account deposit. Failure to do so may forfeit your right to board. Any excess deposit will be refunded to you at the end of the cruise. Traveler's checks may be cashed at the front office to make your deposit. Personal checks are not accepted on board.
accountPage.addFriendsFamily: Add Friends & Family from other Bookings
accountPage.advisorySbn: Optional goods and services are purchased on board by means of an Onboard Account. If paying with cash, you will be presented with a statement of charges and will pay upon disembarkation. If you wish to set up an onboard account online before you embark, you may return to this page and select Set Up Now.

findBookingPage.bookingNumberError: A six character booking number is required
findBookingPage.travelProLabel: I am a Travel Professional checking in on the behalf of a client
findBookingPage.findBookingText:
BENEFITS OF CHECKING IN ONLINE

When you check-in online, you'll be able to take advantage of the following benefits:

  • Signature Preferred Boarding Pass: for speedy embarkation, simply print your pass after completing online check-in. (Keep in a safe place along with your cruise documents).

AVAILABILITY OF EXPRESS DOCS

Your Express Docs will be available:

  • After all Required guests data is complete
  • After payment is complete
  • Within 50 days of your cruise departure

WHAT TO BRING TO THE SHIP

For embarkation remember to bring the following items:

  • Your Signature Preferred Boarding Pass or Express Docs
  • Appropriate identification and passport or government-issued ID
  • Visa and immunization information (if required)

START CHECK-IN EARLY

For your convenience, and to expedite your departure, we encourage all of our guests to utilize the online check-in procedure and start the process as soon as possible. During online check-in, you can securely submit your Immigration, Disembarkation and credit card registration forms. In order to have the most accurate information available onboard your ship, please complete the online check-in process at least 30 days prior to your departure.

INCOMPLETE INFORMATION AND MULTIPLE SESSIONS

If you begin the process and cannot finish due to insufficient information, you may return to complete it at a later time. We recommend starting the process and return at a later time if you are missing information.

ADDITIONAL QUESTIONS

For questions and/or help with your Online Check-in forms, please email Holland America Reservations or call 1-800-207-3545. Please be aware that Holland America Line cannot print, email or fax guest's Express Docs or Signature Preferred Boarding Pass.

findBookingPage.govtPoliciesContent:
Guests are encouraged to complete the Online Check-in process before leaving home. Guests who wait to check in at the terminal risk being unable to sail even if they arrive at the terminal before the vessel leaves. You will be responsible for all costs you incur to join the vessel at the next port. New U.S. government security regulations require us to submit certain guest information to law enforcement authorities at least 60 minutes prior to departure. To meet this requirement, we must have the necessary information in our records at least 90 minutes before departure. If we do not have your information by this deadline, you will be unable to sail.

For guests residing in the European Economic Area (EEA), please note that compliance with these requirements may involve sharing the information you provide to Holland America Line with our affiliates and agents and/or to government and enforcement agencies in the U.S. and other countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA) where controls on data protection may not be as strong as the legal requirements in your country of residence. Holland America Line values your privacy and adheres to best practice technology to protect your private information, utilizing Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. Our Privacy Policy is available for your review.

landingPage.mainSectionContent:
Completing Online Check-in is the first step to making your Express Docs available for you to print. Once you’ve completed Online Check-in, made your final payment and are within 50 days of departure, your Express Docs will be available for you to print.

Online Check-in can be completed in Dutch, German, Spanish and English.

Start Online Check-In Early

For your convenience, and to expedite your departure, we encourage you to start the process as soon as possible. During online check-in, you can securely submit your Immigration, Disembarkation and credit card registration forms. In order to have the most accurate information available onboard your ship, please complete the online check-in process at least 30 days prior to your departure.

Don’t worry if you begin the process and cannot finish for whatever reason; you may easily return to complete it at a later time.

Once you check-in online, you'll receive the following benefits:

  • Boarding Pass: your boarding pass is the first page of your Express Docs. For speedy embarkation, simply print your pass and bring to the pier.

For embarkation, remember to bring the following items:

  • Your Boarding Pass
  • Appropriate identification and passport
  • Visa and immunization information, if required for your itinerary
  • Express Docs

For questions and/or help with completing your Online Check-in forms, please email or call HAL Reservations. Please be aware that Holland America Line cannot print, email or fax guest's Boarding Pass.

New U.S. government security regulations require us to submit certain guest information to law enforcement authorities at least 60 minutes prior to departure. To meet this requirement, we must have the necessary information in our records at least 90 minutes before departure. If we do not have your information by this deadline, you will be unable to sail. Guests are encouraged to complete the Online Check-in process before leaving home. Guests who wait to check in at the terminal risk being unable to sail even if they arrive at the terminal before the vessel leaves. You will be responsible for all costs you incur to join the vessel at the next port.

For guests residing in the European Economic Area (EEA), please note that compliance with these requirements may involve sharing the information you provide to Holland America Line with our affiliates and agents and/or to government and enforcement agencies in the U.S. and other countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA) where controls on data protection may not be as strong as the legal requirements in your country of residence. Holland America Line values your privacy and adheres to best practice technology to protect your private information, utilizing Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption. Our Privacy Policy is available for your review.

passportPage.visaWaiverCopy: If you are from a visa waiver country and have an ESTA authorization you do not need to enter a visa number. Guests from non-visa waiver countries are required to have a valid visa for this itinerary. For additional information, please click HERE.
passportPage.visaSixMonthsCopy: Holland America highly recommends that all guests carry a passport that is valid for at least six months beyond the completion date of your travel. Please carefully verify the existing identification requirements for your particular travel situation.

preferencesPage.dietaryText: The luxury service we are known for extends to meeting your special requests in the dining areas.
preferencesPage.medicalText: Let us support any needs you may have during the voyage.
preferencesPage.celebrationsText: We can make your special day even more so while on board.

staleSession.headline: Are you still there?
staleSession.subHeadline: Your session is about to expire.
staleSession.body: For your security, you will be logged out after 15 minutes of inactivity.
staleSession.sessionExpiredBody: Unfortunately we are unable to extend your session because it already timed out. For security purposes your session only remains active for approximately 20 minutes without any user activity. In 10 seconds you will be redirected to the login page, or click here to continue to the starting page.

login.body: You need to be logged in before using Check-in.
